name: HZNOR
description:
HZNOR Help the robot dodge spikes and other traps with your EPIC platforming skills! Controls: Use the mouse to select & place objects   Credits: Music: Pehus Programming: lowlauch Art: lowlauch Fonts used: Roboto
Playtesters: memlof, Zerstoerer6, Pehus, lowlauch, alexhaim, Gabs, weepa, Lautschi Made using GameMaker Studio 2 during the 4th Wowie Game Jam.
